channel.title: Twitter / bradgessler

item.title: bradgessler: Why doesn't ruby have a decent RSS parser lib? Looks like I get to roll my own...

item.title: bradgessler: If you're a web startup and you haven't already, put your phone number on your website! You'll learn so much.

item.title: bradgessler: Sounds like @TechCrunch needs to be #T@chCrunch and not Michael Arrington. Institutionalize it Mike. http://is.gd/g2yH
